Forum #4 - Sophie Sleigh-Johnson

17 Aug 2018 - Katarina Ranković

Artist and PhD researcher (Goldsmiths) Sophie Sleigh-Johnson presents new prose alongside an excerpt from The Baphomet by Pierre Klossowski and Abstract by William S. Boroughs.

Link to texts

Sophie Sleigh-Johnson is an artist based in Southend-on-Sea, Essex. With a background in music, the practice involves sonic and spoken performances. She is working on a PhD at Goldsmiths College called Radio Bifrons: Broadcasting From The Crypt. Recent projects include Cealdwiellla with New Noveta, Machine of Instant Utility at Cabinet Gallery (group show) and occasional broadcasts of Chthonic Live on Resonance 104.4 FM. In 2015 she published Chthonic Index in collaboration with Simon Martin and Timothy Morton. – sophiesleigh-johnson.co.uk
